mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_DEPARTMENT SET DEPT_NAME = #{name}, DEPT_UPSTAIR= #{upstair} WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{code}
mapper.select: SELECT e.EMP_NO, e.EMP_ID, e.EMP_NAME, e.DEPT_LEADER, p.CODE_NAME as POSITION, j.CODE_NAME as JOB, d.DEPT_NAME as DEPTNAME FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE e JOIN ( SELECT DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} ) d ON e.DEPT_CODE = d.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE p ON e.POSITION_CODE = p.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE j ON e.JOB_CODE = j.CODE_NO WHERE e.USE_YN = 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO AS "empNo", E.EMP_ID as "id", E.EMP_NAME as "name", E.DEPT_LEADER as "leader", P.CODE_NAME as "position", J.CODE_NAME as "job", D.DEPT_NAME as "dept" FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE E, TBL_DEPARTMENT D, TBL_CODE P, TBL_CODE J WHERE E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE AND E.POSITION_CODE = P.CODE_NO AND E.JOB_CODE = J.CODE_NO AND E.DEPT_CODE IN(SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM(SELECT T1.DEPT_CODE, T1.DEPT_NAME, (LEVEL+1) AS "LEVEL", T1.DEPT_UPSTAIR FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y') T1 START WITH T1.DEPT_UPSTAIR = #{deptCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.DEPT_CODE = T1.DEPT_UPSTAIR UNION SELECT DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, 1, DEPT_UPSTAIR FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} )) order by e.dept_code,e.position_code
